lines.text: Look, if I was a butterfly and I lived here, and somebody tried to take me to London, I'd break their face.
Beth, how do you make love to a man?
Oh, Gwendoline, making love to a man is much easier than fighting five guards with your hands tied behind your back!
Oh.
You remember the other night with Willard? Well it's the same thing but kind of not the same thing...
I'm just worried that I'll get everything wrong!

[Gwendoline and Willard are grappling over a precipice]
Go on, let me fall! But it'll be your name I scream on the way down.
What?
That's right, I belong to you body and soul.
[She falls]
Wait, Gwendoline, I don't say that kind of thing! No! Gwendoline, I love you!

[She is squatting on an outcrop, smiling]
I hope that was sincere!

[Willard, Beth and Gwendoline are tied up at the Cheops's encampment]
Gwendoline, have you ever made love?
No.
I can't let you die without making love. Here, move as close as you can.
[They can't reach each other. Willard picks up a straw with his teeth and begins gently poking Gwendoline's face with it]
Now Gwendoline must kill Gwendoline.
[Gwendoline puts on a dead guard's helmet]
In the Yik Yak, isn't there an enormous crevice with smoking gas coming up through it?
Feel like dying?
When I'm close to you, I feel safe!
Tom, you come with me. And you... go take a bath. You stink.
Is it a boa?
No, it's a goldfish.
Ahh!
How did you know?
Call it instinct. I'm infallible.
And you'll get nothing from me, you overdressed gargoyle!
[repeated line]
Superb, you're superb!
Black, you help us; Red, you'll never see us again!
She made me do things that were against the laws of nature!
The queen's will is the will of the queen!
He was wonderful, Beth. Big blue eyes! Long white hands!

[to Gwendoline]
Your upbringing will be the death of us!

[in the Cheops's prison. Gwendoline is crying]
It's a little late to be afraid, don't you think?
Hey, you guys okay? You're not dead or anything?
